live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
43629.summary: Some customers in the McMillan and Lower Ten Oaks area of Abbotsford are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
43629.title: Nov 4 – Abbotsford (McMillan and Lower Ten Oaks) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
43662.summary: Some customers in the Parkland area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
43662.title: Nov 5 – Calgary (Parkland) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
